DOC.brief_summary: Evidence-based guideline recommend cancer surveillance procedure breast cancer survivor include physical examination , mammography , breast self-exam , gynecologic follow-up . The early detection recurrent new cancer best achieve combine , schedule use surveillance procedure . Yet , data suggest 55 % breast cancer survivor undergo procedure recommend . This study test telephone-based psychosocial intervention aim improve adherence recommend surveillance breast cancer survivor . The psychosocial intervention improve adherence compare treatment usual .
DOC.brief_title: Improving Adherence Recommended Surveillance Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.criteria: 21 year age old Diagnosis Stage I IIIA breast cancer Within 1 5 year post primary cancer treatment ( i.e. , surgery , chemotherapy , and/or radiation therapy ) No diagnosis recurrent breast cancer new primary cancer Able provide meaningful consent < 21 year age Unable provide meaningful consent Surgically treat bilateral mastectomy
